i bought alan wake 2 so i wanted to play this first it is an older game so a lot of the animations are hilarious especially in the beginning the narrative is very good and i really like how they marry literary devices and gameplay the gameplay does get repetitive but there are some really nice set pieces especially in chapters 4 and 5  the main weakness of the game is that there isnt enough enemy variety other than that thumbs up
